name: Muriel's Pizzeria: A 2 Player LAN COOP Fnaf Fan Game
name_original: Muriel's Pizzeria: A 2 Player LAN COOP Fnaf Fan Game
description:
Welcome to Muriel's Pizzeria ! We hope you'll enjoy your stay...

Muriel's Pizzeria is 2 PLAYER COOP Five Night's at Freddy's type fangame, where each player controls a different nightguard. In the spirit of making a true fnaf fangame, we made the game point and click.

This game is a 2 player coop LAN game, which mean you need 2 computer connected on the same network to play. If the 2 computers aren't in the same network, you can use programs like Hamachi to create a tunnel which will allow you to play together.

Story : Muriel's Pizzeria is hiring two nightguards for 5 nights ! The pay is 10$ per hour, and you and your friend decided that you'll take the offer. The working hours are 12AM to 6AM. This pizzeria is well known for having its fair share of cool animatronics, which are the main attraction of the pizzeria. It's basically living a childhood dream working in this pizzeria ! Except... not at night...

Main features of the game are :
-> 2 Player LAN COOP with different offices and custom gameplay !
-> Classic Fnaf Experience
-> English and French translation (Only the Phone Guy's subtitles and Death messages)
-> A True Challenge For Fnaf Fans
-> 10 Animatronics... ?
-> Phone Guy's dialogue
-> Unique Animatronic Features
-> Made With GameMaker Studio 2
-> H1dden Lor3...

Will you and your friend be able to solve the mystery surrounding Muriel's Pizzeria ? Only one answer to this question : Survive The Night...

Game Discord : https://discord.gg/c2Tq5zak2D
